Name: The Shedding
About the game: The Shedding is a first person #horror game. An unsettling dark and disturbing game set in an abandoned prison. The game is short, about 15 minutes. Will you be able to make it through or will The Shedding be a nightmare of terror for you? Feel free to ask for a refund if this isn't what you expected.
